BI, Analytics Software,

Dynamic Financial and

Solutions for Oracle
﻿﻿Are You Having Trouble Making Decisions Based on Static Data?

Your Financial Close Processes Take Weeks to Complete


When your ERP / EPM solution can’t consolidate all of your data and drill down from summary to detail, you end up spending more time fixing and reconciling than you do on regular financial processes.

Manually Exporting Data from Oracle to Excel is Inefficient


Manual processes, like exporting data or copy and pasting, are time-consuming and highly prone to errors. When you aren’t confident in your numbers, how can you expect your executive team to be?

Your Reporting Environment and Data Models are Complicated


Retrieving essential data from your Oracle ERP / EPM tools requires experienced developers and involvement from IT. When it gets too hard to manage, you can get wrapped up in lengthy and expensive BI or IT projects.
Produce Interactive Reports and Actionable Insights for Oracle EBS, HFM, Essbase, and EPM Cloud
Oracle ERP Cloud

When everyone has access to accurate, easily refreshable information and the ability to create and share their own reports, the possibilities are endless. Bring your data to life with Spreadsheet Server, an easy-to-use reporting solution for NetSuite. Designed to reduce the reliance on IT and admins by allowing business users to work in the familiar Excel environment, Spreadsheet Server comes pre-configured for GL reporting out of the box and enables you to build reports against any NetSuite module in minutes.

attributes.text: Learn More About Oracle ERP Cloud

attributes.richTextValue: Oracle E-Business Suite (EBS)

Simplify report writing and data analysis with real-time reporting, business intelligence, and analytics for Oracle EBS. Create and share your own reports, automate key financial processes, and quickly combine data from multiple EBS modules and data sources with insightsoftware’s solutions.

attributes.text: Learn About Our Oracle E-Business Suite Solutions

attributes.richTextValue: NetSuite

When everyone has access to accurate, easily refreshable information and the ability to create and share their own reports, the possibilities are endless. Bring your data to life with Spreadsheet Server, an easy-to-use reporting solution for NetSuite. Designed to reduce the reliance on IT and admins by allowing business users to work in the familiar Excel environment, Spreadsheet Server comes pre-configured for GL reporting out of the box and enables you to build reports against any NetSuite module in minutes.
PeopleSoft

Work with real-time data, with a direct connection to PeopleSoft, so you can be confident your decisions are based on consistent, reliable, and accurate information. Refresh reports at any time of the month, with one click, to view the latest data. See changes, including adjustment entries, reflected immediately in your reports. Drill in any report from summary line items to underlying balances, journal entries, and subledger transactions to find and fix reconciliation and consolidation issues fast.

attributes.text: Learn About Our Oracle E-Business Suite Solutions

attributes.richTextValue: Oracle JD Edwards (JDE)

Easily create and share live, drillable reports and dashboards inside Excel throughout your organization with a click. Our solutions are designed for fast-decision making, with streamlined financial processes and intuitive, web-based data visualizations.

Reporting Options with Oracle

﻿R12


So you need to upgrade to Oracle E-Business Suite version R12? There is

hope!

If you are on Oracle E-Business Suite (EBS) 11i, an upgrade to R12 is

unavoidable.


But, what are the compelling reasons for your company to do it? R12 has new industry-based technology and SOA architecture, but enhanced reporting is not on the list. So, what are your choices and where do you go from here? This eBook will fill you in on all things to consider before making the change. If you are still wanting more information after reading then we recommend downloading our complimentary Bloor report on Financial and Business Reporting for Oracle E-Business Suite R12 and 11i.


Download this eBook for an inside look at:

﻿

  • Your current reporting options with Oracle EBS R12; including FSG, Oracle Discoverer, OBIEE, spreadsheet plug-ins, and more
  • Detailed information that will give IT hope for reporting in R12
  • How to rethink reporting and enabling end-users

﻿

Next up: Download the Hope for IT with Oracle E-Business Suite eBook or check out Hubble for Oracle EBS.
